com.viaoa.jfc.editor.html

Class OAHTMLParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.jfc.editor.html.OAHTMLParser

  • public class OAHTMLParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Parse and "clean up" HTML code. Currently used by Editor to convert pasted code from Microsoft Word. This needs to be set up to convert styles to HTML tags.

      convert HTML to safe HTML Strips all span tags, style attributes, makes sure that all attribute values are in quotes ignores bogus attribute names
